abstract: A group of infrastructure funds led by JPMorgan Chase agreed to buy a British water company Southern Water from the Royal Bank of Scotland for about 1.3 billion pounds ($2.7 billion).
lead_paragraph: A group of infrastructure funds led by JPMorgan Chase agreed to buy a British water company Southern Water from the Royal Bank of Scotland for about 1.3 billion pounds ($2.7 billion).

headline.main: JPMorgan Group Laps Up Southern Water for $2.7 Billion
